about_the_game:
Nostalgic and New style.
A new sensation! Retro fantasy shooter

3/25 May not work properly in some Mac environments

Game content

・ A side-scrolling shooter. Let's defeat the mysterious creature "DREAM"

・ One-person game

・ It's easy to play. Recommended for game beginners

・ Equipped with bomb speed-up power-up system

・ Changing stages, boss battles, exhilarating synchronization of screen and BGM! （Only one stage could play in demo version）

・ The number of unique friends will increase! （Only one friend could play in demo version）

・ Fluffy guys plays an active part

・ Heart warming story

・ Personally developed game, debut!

・ Original art and soundtrack to heal the mind


Story

Far from the earth, a story of the universe ...
A alone boy lived leisurely on a small but peaceful star

However, this star is about to be invaded
by the mysterious creature "DREAM"
The boy embarked on an endless journey to save the world

Encounter with unique friends,
Each thought that intersects--
What is waiting for you is ...

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display is recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display is recommended

name: Dream Busters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display is recommended
